                self.Js_hat = np.array([[-3.82524232e+03,-3.16761358e+01,6.25549227e+01, 2.26163387e+00,-2.15635863e+02, 1.18316857e+01],
                                [-2.40806609e+01 ,1.11591279e+03, 5.33462365e+00,-5.43952564e+01,-4.04626424e+00, 1.09386941e+02]])

my_debug_image_20220724_194023_1 快一点
my_debug_image_20220724_193643_-1 慢一点


=====================================================
以下Js初值，在不更新时，图像平面u一维不收敛
[[-3.41610702e+02 -1.61563681e+01  1.24743619e+02  2.91767826e+00
  -3.05454969e+02  5.96228784e+01]
